fr.ensimag.deca.syntax

Class AbstractDecaParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • Parser
      • fr.ensimag.deca.syntax.AbstractDecaParser

  • public abstract class AbstractDecaParser
extends Parser
    The super class of the generated parser. It is extended by the generated code because of the superClass option in the .g file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Create a new parser instance, pre-supplying the input token stream.
